title: Equinox Dusk Trialing Junglers for Split 2
body:
Equinox Dusk finished first in the Oceanic Open Ladder.

We are looking for a Jungler to join us for Split 2 of OOL.

**We Require the successful candidates to have**:
Working Microphone
Stable Net
Shotcalling experience
Competitive drive
Be Self Critical
Capability to function in a team based environment.
Scrim Availability

We are interested in someone who already understands the competitive league of legends or at the least understands the role of the jungler in competitive play and can look to emulate it. We aren't looking for someone who is mechanically extraordinary but rather someone who is a team player. In saying that we would like you to have a higher understanding of the jungler role than most players and be proficient on champions. For this reason alone we will only be taking in applicants of Diamond 3 and above.

**Contact Team Manager IGN**: LincDawg for trial times
